data.message:
Do you need to be commenting? I mean really? You don't. You really do not.

And yet here you are. So perhaps arguing against "need" is not a good idea.

Do you need to wear a tie? Do you REALLY need to wear a suit? Maybe it's time people stop trying to integrate a useless concept of "fashion". People need to understand that child slaves making your shitty tie is bad all around.
Jeremy Wagner-Kaiser  Your rebuttals are really weak. Try proving that someone needs Glass next time.
Actually a lot of people hated on gutenberg for making the printing press. THE MOAR U NO
